subject: Attn:Pete,
body:
From: Dr. Kingsley Obiora
Deputy Governor
Central Bank of Nigeria
PIOT 33, AbubakarTafawa Balewa Way,
Central Zone- Abuja.
Central Business District,
Federal Republic of Nigeria.
Date:10/2/2024
Tel: +  234-8164936795

Ref: CBN/FPD/0101373/14

Attn:BENEFICIARY

Attn:Pete,

Thank you for your email.

I request you forward to me your contact information as stated below:

1. Name in full
2. Address
3. Contact telephone and fax number
4. Private mobile line.
5. You occupation
6. Age
7.Attached valid Working ID for your identification by the
8 Your Whatsapp Numbe

As soon as you  send me this information, i will send you the
information to enable you open communication with the bank and also
As matter of urgency,as soon as i received requirements is process i will
forward to you the  bank information to enables you open communication
with the paying US$10.5M The PKB Bank in Canada

I wait to hear from you.

Respectfully yours,
Call me for more details Direct line Tel: + 234-8164936795

Yours truly,
Dr. Kingsley Obiora
Deputy GovernorK,
Economic Policy Directorate
CBN, Nigeria
Tel: + 234-8164936795

subject: Re: Attn:Pete,
body:
Dear Dr. Kingsley Obiora,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the opportunity to communicate with you. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. Can you please provide more information about the purpose of this communication? What is it that you would like to share or discuss with me?

2. Why do you require my full name, address, contact telephone and fax number, private mobile line, occupation, age, valid working ID, and WhatsApp number? How will this information be used?

3. Could you please clarify what you mean by "the bank" and "the paying US The PKB Bank in Canada"? Are these related to the Central Bank of Nigeria?

I look forward to your response and gaining a better understanding of the matter at hand.

Best wishes,
Pete

subject: Re: Attn:Pete,
body:
Dear Dr. Kingsley Obiora,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your email and the opportunity to communicate with you. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further.

1. Can you please provide more information about the purpose of this communication? What is it that you would like to share or discuss with me?
2. Why do you need my full name, address, contact telephone and fax number, private mobile line, occupation, age, valid working ID, and WhatsApp number? How will this information be used?
3. Could you please explain what "the" refers to in your sentence "As soon as you send me this will send you the to enable you open with the bank and also As matter of soon as received is process will forward to you the bank to enables you open with the paying The PKB Bank Canada"?

I look forward to your response and clarification on these matters.

Best wishes,
Pete
